Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc31
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.view.tui

Class PlayingState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.view.tui.TUIstate
it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.view.tui.PlayingState
public class PlayingState extends TUIstate
TUIstate in which the player can play the running game.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      protected void initialize()
      User-executable commands for the PlayingState
      • help - Shows commands info
      • quit - quit the game
      • ref - refresh
      • dg - draw gold
      • dr - draw resource
      • co - Choose secrete objective
      • ps - Play starter
      • p - Play
      • s - Select card
      • c - Change side
      • cs - Change starter side
      • mv - Move play area
      • cp - Change play area
      Specified by:
      initialize in class TUIstate

      • InitState.initialize()
      • JoinedToGameState.initialize()

    • command_showGames

      protected void command_showGames()
      Sends the request to the Controller to show the list of available games. Blocks the cmdLineReaderThread until the Controller responds with ShowUpdate.show_listGame(java.util.List)

    • command_drawGold

      protected void command_drawGold()
      Sends the request to the GameController to draw a gold card.

      Asks the user which card he wants to draw:

      • 0 -> from top of the deck
      • 1 -> card 1
      • 2 -> card 2
      • -1 -> quit command

      It calls TUIstate.stateNotify() to unblock the cmdLineReaderThread.

      Specified by:
      command_drawGold in class TUIstate
      See Also:
      • ClientCommands.drawGold(int)
      • invalid reference 
        it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.controller.GameController#drawGold(int)

    • command_drawResource

      protected void command_drawResource()
      Sends the request to the GameController to draw a resource card.

      Asks the user which card he wants to draw:

      • 0 -> from top of the deck
      • 1 -> card 1
      • 2 -> card 2
      • -1 -> quit command

      It calls TUIstate.stateNotify() to unblock the cmdLineReaderThread.

      Specified by:
      command_drawResource in class TUIstate
      See Also:
      • ClientCommands.drawResource(int)
      • invalid reference 
        it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.controller.GameController#drawResource(int)

    • command_chooseSecreteObjective

      protected void command_chooseSecreteObjective()
      Sends the request to the GameController to choose a secret objective.

      Asks the user which card he wants to choose:

      • 1 -> Secret Objective 1
      • 2 -> Secret Objective 2
      • -1 -> quit command

      It calls TUIstate.stateNotify() to unblock the cmdLineReaderThread.

      Specified by:
      command_chooseSecreteObjective in class TUIstate
      See Also:
      • ClientCommands.chooseSecretObjective1()
      • ClientCommands.chooseSecretObjective2()
      • invalid reference 
        it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.controller.GameController#chooseSecretObjective1()

    • command_play

      protected void command_play()
      Sends the request to the GameController to play a card.

      Asks the user to type the X and Y coordinates where to place the card:

      It calls TUIstate.stateNotify() to unblock the cmdLineReaderThread.

      Specified by:
      command_play in class TUIstate
      See Also:
      • ClientCommands.play(Point)
      • GameController.play(String, Point)

    • command_selectCard

      protected void command_selectCard()
      Sends the request to the GameController to select a card.

      Asks the user to type the index of the card he wants to select.

      It calls TUIstate.stateNotify() to unblock the cmdLineReaderThread.

      Specified by:
      command_selectCard in class TUIstate
      See Also:
      • ClientCommands.selectCard(int)
      • GameController.selectCard(String, int)

    • command_movePlayArea

      protected void command_movePlayArea()
      Calls the TUI methods that move the play area in the specified direction.

      Asks the user in which direction he wants to move the play area:

      • r -> right
      • l -> left
      • u -> up
      • d -> down

      It calls TUIstate.stateNotify() to unblock the cmdLineReaderThread.

      Specified by:
      command_movePlayArea in class TUIstate
      See Also:
      • TUI.movePlayAreaRight()
      • TUI.movePlayAreaLeft()
      • TUI.movePlayAreaUp()
      • TUI.movePlayAreaDown()

    • command_changePlayArea

      protected void command_changePlayArea()
      Calls the TUI method that changes the active play area.

      Asks the user which player's play area he wants to see.

      The TUIstate.stateNotify() call to unblock the cmdLineReaderThread is not needed cause the calls flow terminate in the command_refresh() method that calls TUIstate.stateNotify().

      Specified by:
      command_changePlayArea in class TUIstate

    • setUsername

      protected void setUsername()
      Unimplemented method in this TUIstate
      Specified by:
      setUsername in class TUIstate
      See Also:
      • InitState.setUsername()
      • ClientCommands.setUsernameCall(String)

    • command_invalidCommand

      protected void command_invalidCommand()
      Description copied from class: TUIstate
      If there is non user-executable corresponding to the typed tag by the user this command is called. It prints a message to the user that the command is invalid.

      It calls TUIstate.stateNotify() to unblock the cmdLineReaderThread.

      Overrides:
      command_invalidCommand in class TUIstate

    • command_quitGame

      protected void command_quitGame()
      Sends the request to the GameController to quit the game.
      Specified by:

      See Also:
      • ClientCommands.quitGame()

    • command_refresh

      protected void command_refresh()
      Calls the TUI method that refreshes the TUI. That method will call TUIstate.stateNotify() to unblock the cmdLineReaderThread.
      Specified by:
      command_refresh in class TUIstate
      See Also:
      • TUI.forceRefreshTUI(boolean)
